definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: This tape is about Grand Turk Island.
Mr Grant dotes on his granddaughter. She's the apple of his eye.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特先生很溺愛他的小孫女，她是他的掌上明珠。
誰被埋在格蘭特墓裏面？

sentences.english: The entrance of a Grants and Crawfords was a favourable epoch.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特夫婦和克勞福特姐弟的到場是一個有力的轉折。

sentences.english: Technicolor Cheek was based on UF Grant's trick Cheek to Cheek.
sentences.chinese: 彩色印片面頰根據UF格蘭特的把戲面頰對面頰。

sentences.english: Mrs. Grant's non-attendance was sad indeed.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特太太來不了真令人遺憾。

sentences.english: It took three weeks for Grant's men to reach the steamboat landing. The roads were very rough.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特主力經過三個星期纔到達汽船登陸點。

sentences.english: Grant, the captain, has been with the company for 13 years. He still gets seasick.
sentences.chinese: 船長格蘭特在這家公司已經13年了，還是有點暈船。

sentences.english: About the only person who can comfort Alim is Cary Grant.
sentences.chinese: 關於唯一的人誰可以安慰阿利姆是加里格蘭特。

sentences.english: Grant then ordered the rest of his army to cross to the east side of the river. Some of his officers protested.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特隨後命令他的其餘部隊全部渡河到東岸去。

sentences.english: Grant heard the artillery booming and sent orders that it should stop.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特聽見炮響，便下令停止。

sentences.english: Grant died of throat cancer in 1885 at the age of 63.
sentences.chinese: 一八八五年，格蘭特死於喉癌，死時六十三歲。

sentences.english: Millennium Park is an extension of Chicago's Grant Park.
sentences.chinese: 太平盛世公園是對芝加哥格蘭特公園的擴大。

sentences.english: Grant was of humble origin, shabby in dress, rough in speech and manners.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特出身低微，衣着腌臢，說話粗魯，態度生硬。

sentences.english: She was bron to Mr. and Mrs. Grant.
sentences.chinese: 她是格蘭特夫婦的女兒。

sentences.english: Grant wasted no time. He quickly sent troops to fight the Confederate force blocking the Tennessee River.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭特馬不停蹄，迅速出兵，阻南軍于田納西州河畔。
